content.0: In order to satisfy even more customers, GIF-CO offers a service ready to decorate for personalized interior. This service takes into account the layout and decoration of your future residence. Such as furniture, painting, lighting, laying of parquet and wall until kitchen decoration, bathroom, living room, bedroom garage and so on.
content.1: To sum up, unique finishes adapted to your sensitivity outside construction and second work included in the turnkey service.
